mapper.select: select id, cart_id, goods_id, goods_name, picture_url, buy_number, goods_original_price, goods_promotion_price from t_cart_info where cart_id=#{cartId}
select id, user_id from t_cart where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_cart_info (cart_id, goods_id, goods_name, picture_url, buy_number, goods_original_price, goods_promotion_price) values(#{cartId},#{goodsId},#{goodsName},#{pictureUrl},#{buyNumber},#{goodsOriginalPrice},#{goodsPromotionPrice})
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart_info where cart_id=#{cartId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update t_cart_info set buy_number=#{changeNumber} where cart_id=#{cartId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
